alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calhoun, northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, western Sumter, northwestern Orangeburg and southeastern Richland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookdale, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sumter, Orangeburg, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Brookdale, Williston, Blackville, St. Matthews, Eastover, Oakland, Mulberry, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, Barnwell State Park, North, Pinewood, Springfield, Hilda and Neeses. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 132 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg; Richland; Sumter
